snippet: Prosecutors on Monday charged a 40-year-old Swede with 3 counts of murder and 12 counts of attempted murder in a string of shootings in the southern city of Malmo.
abstract: Swedish prosecutors charge Peter Mangs with 3 counts of murder and 12 counts of attempted murder in string of shootings that spread fear among immigrants in the southern city of Malmo.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors on Monday charged a 40-year-old Swede with 3 counts of murder and 12 counts of attempted murder in a string of shootings in the southern city of Malmo.

headline.main: Sweden: Charges Filed in Killings of Immigrants in Southern City
headline.print_headline: Sweden: Charges Filed in Killings Of Immigrants in Southern City
